citationDetail: Technical note for DCPP-Component C. I. Definition of the Anomalous Sea Surface Temperature patterns.
title: Technical note for DCPP-Component C. I. Definition of the Anomalous Sea Surface Temperature patterns.

url.description: The suite of steps that have been followed to produce the anomalous sea surface temperature (SST) patterns from observations for the AMV and IPV.
url.name: Technical note for DCPP-Component C. 1, Definition of the Anomalous Sea Surface Temperature patterns.

abstract: This short note documents in detail the suite of steps that have been followed to produce the anomalous sea surface temperature (SST) patterns from observations, which are representative of the Atlantic Multidecadal Variability (AMV)  and the Interdecadal Pacific Variability (IPV), and that are subsequently used in DCPP-Component C idealized model experiments.
context: The suite of steps that have been followed to produce the anomalous sea surface temperature (SST) patterns from observations for the AMV and IPV.
